title: Repo sync

details: Added new tutorial page: "Synthesizing research" under "Communicate effectively" section.
Tutorial demonstrates using Copilot Chat to synthesize research findings into cohesive summaries.
Includes example scenario, prompt, and response for research about a fictional EcoSmart Bottle product.
Updated index.md to include the new tutorial in the children section.
